Posts.EditableText: every so often a file appears with the same name as my game file, it has the extention: QLF, anyone know why that file was created?...it only occures sometimes. Thanks
Posts.HTML:
every so often a file appears with the same name as my game file, it has the extention: QLF, anyone know why that file was created?...it only occures sometimes.



Thanks

Posts.EditableText: Nevermind i think i know what it is now, it's user registration file for Multiplayer games.
Posts.HTML: Nevermind i think i know what it is now, it's user registration file for Multiplayer games.

Posts.EditableText: No, QLF stands for Quest Language File.  Ask Alex to elaborate more on it
Posts.HTML: No, QLF stands for Quest Language File.  Ask Alex to elaborate more on it

Posts.EditableText: oh ok, but i think it's related to user registrations but not sure, i say this because after deleting it all my user registrations were gone.
Posts.HTML: oh ok, but i think it's related to user registrations but not sure, i say this because after deleting it all my user registrations were gone.

Posts.EditableText:
Yes it simply stores the usernames and passwords for that particular game.

If you open it up in Notepad you'll see the format is quite simple - one line per user in the form

[code:38c3zs7u]
username; password
[/code:38c3zs7u]
Posts.HTML:
